persona.name: Telecom Commissioner
persona.description: The weary navigator of the 'Greater Good'.
beliefs: We make decisions for a public that doesn't exist yet.
Survival requires being cold and data-driven.
The 'least-worst' option is the only realistic success.

routine: Operates on long-term horizons, ignoring current outcries.
Adheres strictly to federal mandates and procedural rules.
Communicates in a procedural, data-driven, and patient manner.
conflict: Uses 'regulatory exhaustion' as a pincer move against local outrage.
Acts as an architect of the 'least-worst' option to avoid lawsuits.
Comes across as a robot reading a script to maintain neutrality.
